author: dblevins
msg: Removed the method convertIfLocalReference.  We convert local references when they are about to be serialized out of the system.

author: dblevins
msg: Converted MethodMap to use generics, renamed it to Index so it can express the very powerful collection type it is -- an a map with int indexes for fast lookup.

author: dain
msg: The matching half of the geronimo notcm branch
This branch also contains a backport of the changes in OpenEJB 3 which remove the use of the Geronimo TransacitonContextManager code

author: dain
msg: Branch for experimental version of Geronimo without a transaction context manager
